posts.author: Nokteronoth
posts.content:
I've been trying out Dwarven Barbs lately, if you all couldn't tell. So here's another.

Arelith, so this one takes Gifts. (+2 STR +2 CON +2 DEX) for 2.5 ECL. This means it gets XP as if it were 2 and a half levels above what it is.

PvM, will probably do terribly in PVP except for that massive HP. Even then, I added Improved Disarm just for it.

Any Non-Lawful Alignment
1-30

STR: 17 (24)
DEX: 10
CON: 22
WIS: 8
INT: 14
CHA: 6

Dwarf: (Darkvision, Defensive Training vs. Giants, Stonecunning, Hardiness vs. Poison, Hardiness vs. Spells, Offensive Training vs. Goblinoids, Offensive Training vs. Orcs, Skill Affinity: Lore)
01: Barbarian(1): Weapon Focus: Greataxe
02: Barbarian(2): {Uncanny Dodge I}
03: Barbarian(3): Knockdown

07: Barbarian(7)

09: Barbarian(9): Improved Knockdown
10: Barbarian(10)

17: Barbarian(17)

21: Champion of Torm(1): Epic Damage Reduction I
22: Champion of Torm(2): Epic Damage Reduction II
23: Champion of Torm(3): {Smite Evil}
24: Barbarian(18): STR+1, Terrifying Rage, (STR=23)
25: Barbarian(19)

27: Barbarian(20): Mighty Rage

Appraise 12(14), Discipline 33(40), Heal 10(9), Intimidate 31(29), Listen 31(30), Open Lock 5(5), Set Trap 5(5), Taunt 30(28), Tumble 30(30), UMD 15(13)

Hitpoints: 504
Skillpoints: 202
Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 25/13/16
Saving Throw bonuses: Spells: +2, Traps: +5, Poison: +2
BAB: 24
AB (max, naked): 34 (melee), 24 (ranged)
AC (naked/mundane armor/shield only): 18/26
Spell Casting:
Alignment Changes: 0

Like the other build, this abuses that you can get drunk on Arelith, for the first hour you get +6 STR at -4 DEX, and after that hour, +12 STR and no dex penalty until the drunkenness wears off. (Another hour)

AC should be pretty lame- 10 nat + 2 AS + 6 Tumble + 6 DEX(If you're wearing leather/padded, whichever's best) + 1 ammy + 1 boots + 4 armor(Assumed +3 padded) = 30. No shield, so it's kind-of hurting, but the HP should help some. Especially since they can carry hundreds of healing kits with that massive STR.

AB should be 24+13+3+3 = 43/38/33/28

UMD for using scrolls and the like. You all know the drill.

~Nok

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hey.

I'm not familiar with Arelith, but I reckon if you are going to have that much DR, you could consider going Epic Prowess instead of Armor Skin. You can soak up the damage and get another AB point, since your AC isn't going to be all that special with or without Armor Skin. Other than that, nice build!

Take it EZ!
